item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 10, 2024 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Willow, Our Quantum Chip (805 points | 347 comments)
3. Starlink's first constellation of direct-to-phone satellites is now in orbit (100 points | 66 comments)

6. Trellis – 3D mesh generative model (191 points | 37 comments)

10. Xylella Fastidiosa: A crisis brewing in Europe's olive groves (41 points | 17 comments)
11. Software developer arrested in connection with murder of healthcare executive (324 points | 580 comments)
12. GPS constellation as a way to image the ionosphere (2011) (14 points | 4 comments)

22. A simple way to scale pixel art games (100 points | 36 comments)
23. "This is not a joke, Funko just called my mom" (505 points | 120 comments)

27. MagiskSSH – SSH server on Android without Termux (104 points | 64 comments)
